doc.education: Unrevealed, extensive knowledge of Egyptian magical lore
doc.identity: The general populace of Earth was unaware of Osiris' existence
doc.knownrelatives: Atum-Ra (great-grandfather), Shu (great-Grandmother), Tefnut (grandmother), Geb (father), Nut (mother), Seth (brother), Nephthys (sister), Hathor  (daughter-in-law), Isis (wife), Horus, Anubis (sons), Bast (granduncle)
doc.occupation: Ruler of the Gods of Egypt and god of the dead
doc.powers: Osiris possessed superhuman strength, reflexes, stamina and agility. He also had metahuman regenerative powers that accelerated his healing process.
